column12: They should fully understand the subject they are teaching so that if a student asks questions, there are no doubts in answering them. Also, sometimes it is easier to ask or work with the teacher if the communication is a bit more relaxed, as it does not create unnecessary tension or fear during lectures.
column20: Interactive methods of presenting information, rather than just dry theory, since the lecture time is long and it is usually difficult to maintain attention from the middle if only theory is presented.
column29: Overall, there is a good atmosphere between students and the teacher, as maintaining good relationships makes it easier to communicate and achieve better results.
column36: When we are talking about many new things at once, and it is not emphasized what is actually relevant and what is not.
